name: Haunted Hotel: Death Sentence Collector's Edition
name_original: Haunted Hotel: Death Sentence Collector's Edition
description:
Haunted Hotel: Death Sentence Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Big Fish Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Haunted Hotel: Death Sentence Collector's Edition on PC.
